parse.title: Trolls (Slayer assignment)
parse.text:
Trolls are a type of Slayer assignment.

Contents

  • 1 Slayer Masters
  • 2 Eligible monsters
    • 2.1 Surface
    • 2.2 Dungeoneering
    • 2.3 Minigames
    • 2.4 Quest
    • 2.5 Removed

Slayer Masters[edit | edit source]

The following Slayer Masters assign trolls:

MasterTask amountsUnlock requirements
Turael10-20None
Chaeldar110-170None
Sumona120-185None
